metadata.Title: CVE-2022-37290 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: GNOME Nautilus 42.2 allows a NULL pointer dereference and get_basename application crash via a pasted ZIP archive.

criterions.comment: caja: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
nautilus: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
nemo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
